page.title: 04A farmer's daughter.
page.content: I live on a farm in the village.I get up at eight o'clock to help my dad deliver milk.After that I get my breakfast then go and watch television for a little bit then I go out to call for my friends.We sometimes play tennis.After we have finished playing,we go swimming in the river.I took my friend's dinghy.It is cold when you first get in.We swim a few lengths then I eat my packed lunch.I had some egg sandwiches some sweets and an apple too.Then it was time to go home.When I got home,my mam said Icould stay out till five o'clock because that is when my tea is ready.Then I went out.I like taking my dog for a walk so I took it for a walk.I took it through the fields.My dog is called Bess.Then I put her back in her kennel.I got the dogs' bowls and filled them with water.
